      • BuildUriFromUserKey

        @Nullable
public static android.net.Uri BuildUriFromUserKey(@NonNull
                                                            android.content.Context context,
                                                            @NonNull
                                                            java.lang.String user,
                                                            @NonNull
                                                            java.lang.String key)
        Get uri of the about contents in the GiiftProvider.
        Parameters:
        user - id of the user
        key - the key associated with the value to be returned (e.g terms, privacy)
        Returns:
        uri of the retailer content to be fetched
        See Also:
        GiiftProvider

      • UpdateFromJSon

        public static android.net.Uri UpdateFromJSon(@NonNull
                                             android.content.Context context,
                                             @NonNull
                                             java.lang.String key,
                                             java.lang.String value,
                                             @NonNull
                                             java.lang.String user)
        Read a retailer data from its JSON representation and update it in the GiiftProvider if necessary. To be inserted a content needs to have retailer id.
        Parameters:
        context - used to access to the database
        key - key for the value
        value - the content for retailer (e.g terms,privacy etc)
        user - id of the currently logged in user
        Returns:
        uri of the card used to access it through the GiiftProvider
